explains: adj. 不充分的，不够重要的
wordGroup: insufficient memory 内存空间不足

sentences.en: His salary is insufficient to meet his needs.
sentences.cn: 他的薪水不够应付需要。

sentences.en: Facilities for people with disabilities are still insufficient.
sentences.cn: 供残疾人使用的设施仍然不足。

sentences.en: Our industry suffers through insufficient investment in research.
sentences.cn: 我们的工业因研究投入不足而大吃苦头。
